title: NBFCs securitisation volumes to rise 20-25% in FY23, says ICRA - The Financial Express
content: NBFCs securitisation volumes to rise 20-25% in FY23, says ICRA  The Financial Express
description: Rating agency ICRA also expect the securitisation market to be largely dominated by the retail asset class which would account for 95% of the market in the current financial year.
